attributes.action: If the PM broke the law they must resign
attributes.additional_details: Because the PM should be law abiding and a role model as the leader of this country
attributes.background: Hold a vote of no confidence

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require a Prime Minister be removed from office if found to have broken the law: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614729
